lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:06.390]Yeah, yeah
[00:09.520]Skirt, skirt
[00:12.310]When they see me pullin' up,all they do is show me love
[00:15.600]Cuz they know I'm comin' through in a foreign, foreign, foreign
[00:19.380]Only say that I'm the man, when I make a hundred grand
[00:22.170]Cuz you know I'm comin' through in a foreign, foreign, foreign
[00:26.150]Ohhhhhhhhh
[00:33.280]Ohhhhhhhhh
[00:39.910]Just doin' what I do, yeah yeah
[00:43.240]You know it's nothin' new, yeah yeah
[00:46.690]Just stayin' with the truth, yeah yeah
[00:49.920]So now you think it's cool, yeah yeah
[00:53.710]Cuz when we got no love I never saw your face and now I see that
[01:01.230]Now people believe you try to fill my space I can't believe that
[01:07.950]All these new friends I think I'm losin' track
[01:15.620]But nothin's real it's only just an act
[01:20.660]When they see me pullin' up,all they do is show me love
[01:23.890]Cuz they know I'm comin' through in a foreign, foreign, foreign
[01:27.870]Only say that I'm the man, when I make a hundred grand
[01:31.020]Cuz you know I'm comin' through in a foreign, foreign, foreign
[01:34.750]Ohhhhhhhhh
[01:41.680]Ohhhhhhhhh
[01:45.910]
[01:46.950]Skirt!
[01:48.640]Ok well last week everybody at me
[01:51.580]People that I never knew before are tryna dap me
[01:54.910]Na na ******, don't dap me
[01:56.660]Don't you try to gas me
[01:58.200]Never ******' with me when I'm whippin' in a Camry
[02:01.690]Ok well I should stick to my own advice
[02:04.230]****** around and stay broke
[02:05.820]Wanna be with me with me all night cuz I got this cash and they don't
[02:09.230]Don't you hit my phone, no
[02:11.260]Tryna be a no no
[02:12.760]Could be in my Rari, but I'm staying here at home no way
[02:16.740]I don't go nowhere
[02:18.480]I don't know no one
[02:20.190]Cuz the partyin' and bull******t soundin' like no fun
[02:23.760]
[02:25.050]Ok cuz everytime they see me
[02:26.690]They just really wanna meet me
[02:28.530]And these dudes ain't wanna be me
[02:30.140]I ain't bout it
[02:31.480]Cop the whip a year ago, the mileage is a thousand
[02:34.620]I can't be alone no more, it's always super crowded
[02:38.050]You'd say it'd be easy being me
[02:39.990]But I doubt it, yeah I doubt it
[02:43.230]When they see me pullin' up,all they do is show me love
[02:46.520]Cuz they know I'm comin' through in a foreign, foreign, foreign
[02:50.300]Only say that I'm the man, when I make a hundred grand
[02:53.590]Cuz you know I'm comin' through in a foreign, foreign, foreign
[02:57.180]Ohhhhhhhhh
[03:04.300]Ohhhhhhhhh
tlyric:
[by:水原加奈子]
[00:06.390]Yeah, yeah
[00:09.520]skrrr skrrr
[00:12.310]他们这些人一看我停下车 就对我疯狂示爱
[00:15.600]因为他们知道我开的是一辆外国车
[00:19.380]他们只有看到我钱多的没处花 才会称我为大佬
[00:22.170]因为你知道的 我开的是一辆外国车
[00:26.150]ohhhhhh
[00:33.280]ohhhhhhhhh
[00:39.910]只是做我该做的
[00:43.240]你知道 没什么新鲜的
[00:46.690]只是保持着真实
[00:49.920]所以现在你觉得这挺不错的
[00:53.710]因为我们之间并没有爱 我从未看清你的面目但现在终于看到了
[01:01.230]现在人们觉得是你尝试着填补我的情感缺陷 但我不这么认为
[01:07.950]这些刚交的朋友我觉得我疯了
[01:15.620]但没什么是真实的 一切都是表演
[01:20.660]他们这些人一看我停下车 就对我疯狂示爱
[01:23.890]因为他们知道我开的是一辆外国车
[01:27.870]他们只有看到我钱多的没处花 才会称我为大佬
[01:31.020]因为你知道的 我开的是一辆外国车
[01:34.750]ohhhhhhhh
[01:41.680]ohhhhhhhhhh
[01:46.950]skrrr
[01:48.640]上周所有人都在我家
[01:51.580]那些我从来都没见过的人想和我打招呼
[01:54.910]别 别跟我套近乎
[01:56.660]也别想着毒死我
[01:58.200]当我在一辆凯美瑞里的时候别惹我
[02:01.690]好吧 我知道我本该坚持听从我对自己的建议
[02:04.230]不务正业 贫穷为伴
[02:05.820]你想要整夜都和我在一起 是因为我有钱而他们没有
[02:09.230]别给我打电话
[02:11.260]别尝试做那样的人
[02:12.760]我本来可以在法拉利里 但我现在正在家
[02:16.740]哪都不去
[02:18.480]我谁也不认识
[02:20.190]因为你这个party什么的听起来一点意思都没有
[02:25.050]好吧其实是因为他们一看到我
[02:26.690]他们就想认识我
[02:28.530]这些家伙想成为我这样的人
[02:30.140]我没法说
[02:31.480]一年前的警察局长 一千英里的里程
[02:34.620]我再也无法一个人待着 我身边总是无比拥挤
[02:38.050]你说 做我这样的人很容易
[02:39.990]是吗 我很怀疑
[02:43.230]他们这些人一看我停下车 就对我疯狂示爱
[02:46.520]因为他们知道我开的是一辆外国车
[02:50.300]他们只有看到我钱多的没处花 才会称我为大佬
[02:53.590]因为你知道的 我开的是一辆外国车
